Moving and Copying Files and Directories

Copy File and Copy Dir don't currently have tests but as Move File and Move Dir use them internally they are somehow tested. At least simple tests for them should be added anyway.
Test Case Action Argument Argument Argument
Move File Create FIle
 ${TESTFILE} contents
Move File ${TESTFILE} ${TESTFILE2}
Fail If Exists ${TESTFILE}
Get and Check File ${TESTFILE2} contents
Move File To Existing Dir Create Dir ${TESTDIR}${/}foo
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}${/}bar
Create FIle
 ${TESTFILE} contents
Move File ${TESTFILE} ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar # Destination file name given
Fail If Exists ${TESTFILE}
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar contents
Move File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar ${TESTDIR}${/}bar # No destination file name given
Fail If Exists ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar${/}bar contents
Move File To Non-Existing Dir Create FIle
 ${TESTFILE} contents
Move File ${TESTFILE} ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar # Destination file name given
# Note that there can't be ${/}
# at the end
Fail If Exists ${TESTFILE}
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar contents
Move File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar ${TESTDIR}${/}bar${/} # No destination file name given
# Note that ${/} at the end is
# mandatory
Fail If Exists ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}bar
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar${/}bar contents
Moving Non-Existing File Fails [ Document ] FAIL Source file 'non-existing-file.txt' does not exist

Move File non-existing-file.txt whatever.txt
Move Directory [ Document ] Moving directory around. Moving to excisting and non-existing directory should pass. PASS

Create Directory ${TESTDIR}${/}sub
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}world.txt world
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}tellus.txt tellus
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}sub${/}marine.txt sub\nmarine
# Move to new dir (same as rename)
Move Directory ${TESTDIR} ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo
Fail If Exists ${TESTDIR}
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}world.txt world
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}tellus.txt tellus
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}sub${/}marine.txt sub\nmarine
# Move to existing dir
Create Directory ${TESTDIR}
Move Directory ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo ${TESTDIR}
Fail If Exists ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}world.txt world
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}tellus.txt tellus
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo${/}sub${/}marine.txt sub\nmarine
# Move to non-existing with missing intermediate dirs
Move Directory ${TESTDIR}${/}foo ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}bar
Fail If Exists ${TESTDIR}${/}foo
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}bar${/}world.txt world
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}bar${/}tellus.txt tellus
Get and Check File ${TESTDIR2}${/}foo${/}bar${/}sub${/}marine.txt sub\nmarine

Needed User Keywords

Keyword Action Argument Argument Argument

${content} Get File ${path}
Fail Unless Equal ${content} ${expected}

Remove Dir ${path_to_dir}

Create Dir ${path_to_dir}
